QuestData.Title: Feegly the Exiled
QuestData.Description: Saddest story I ever heard told, $n. Feegly was one of our fastest diggers, until he got a hold of that - thing. "The Tear of the Moons" we called it. It changed him. Remade him. I wish it had stayed buried.$B$BFeegly was banished from Bael Modan but I've heard reports he's come sniffing around the dig site again. He's suffered enough, the wretched thing. If you find him down there, put ol' Feegly out of his misery.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Feegly the Exiled in the Bael Modan Digsite.
QuestData.RewardText: <Marley nods grimly.>$B$BAye, it's for the best I suppose.
